code: @Bean(name = TaskManagementConfigUtils.ASYNC_ANNOTATION_PROCESSOR_BEAN_NAME) @Role(BeanDefinition.ROLE_INFRASTRUCTURE) public AsyncAnnotationBeanPostProcessor asyncAdvisor() {     Assert.notNull(this.enableAsync, "@EnableAsync annotation metadata was not injected").     AsyncAnnotationBeanPostProcessor bpp = new AsyncAnnotationBeanPostProcessor().     bpp.configure(this.executor, this.exceptionHandler).     Class<? extends Annotation> customAsyncAnnotation = this.enableAsync.getClass("annotation").     if (customAsyncAnnotation != AnnotationUtils.getDefaultValue(EnableAsync.class, "annotation")) {         bpp.setAsyncAnnotationType(customAsyncAnnotation).     }     bpp.setProxyTargetClass(this.enableAsync.getBoolean("proxyTargetClass")).     bpp.setOrder(this.enableAsync.<Integer>getNumber("order")).     return bpp. }
